website_summaries.verdict: The Puma x Fenty Chelsea Sneaker Boot combines the brand's edgy rubber platform with the classic Chelsea cleat. The result conveyed an unapologetically edgy pair that would resonate with fans who love the extraordinary.This snazzy pair is commended for its comfort, style, and its ability to add height, which are the reasons why people purchased despite its slightly expensive price.
pros: A "show stopper" and a "stunner" are some of the words used for the Puma x Fenty Chelsea Sneaker Boot
Majority of the reviews state that this sneaker cleat is very comfortable
A greater number of the wearers are delighted that the shoe is easy to walk in despite its bulky sole
The sneaker cleat fits true to size, according to several purchasers
A few shoe users love the fact that the pair's elevated platform makes them look taller than usual
The Puma x Fenty Chelsea Sneaker Cleat's materials and construction are deemed to have excellent quality by most consumers
One reviewer comments that the elastic garter at the rear part of the upper allows for easy on and off
Many consumers consider this kick as an amazing purchase for its overall value
cons: Most reviewers have mentioned that the kick felt snug at first and needed time to break in
Unlike most Puma sneakers, a handful of purchasers find the sneaker boot to be a bit pricey

customer_reviews.title: My new fly  fenty bootie
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these boots and after reading through the reviews on Amazon and other website reviews I decided to go up a half size due to the narrow cut of the front of the boot and also although I have slimmer ankles I realize that the boot are made for thicker ankles ..but the leather is so nice and the boot is beautiful and definitely chunky ..I gave it 4 because of the ankle width and the boot not being true to size...the boots are crazy hot tho no bull😃Amazon price is the lowest everywhere and trust me they are still over 200 or better in Nordstrom’s and other high end retailers
customer_reviews.author: Incognito72

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it’s Fenty.
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten a size down but I love them so I’m keeping them. I wear a 7, got a 7.5 based off the reviews saying they run a bit small.. but I should have stayed w/ my actual size. I love them tho lol can’t say that enough. Fenty for $50...cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: melanee brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I’m normally a 8 1/2 but I got them in 9’s just in case. They’re def real and are so beautiful. I’m so happy I waited til they were this low in price to get. They were originally 220 and I waited til they were 50 bucks to get. Love love love. Thank you Rihanna!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa93

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes; a lot...
customer_reviews.text: I’m laughing as I write this review because all my friends hate these shoes. Yet they are comfortable, perfect for bad weather rainy days and I happen to love the way they look and fit. My friends will get over their dislike; after all, it’s my feet and they are happy feet when wearing these shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible inside and out!
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap. Leather is stiff and doesn’t stretch but creases very easily. Lining not leather as described on Pumas website. Feels cheap and clunky. Looks like a rain boot. Extremely narrow even though I went 1/2 size up. Ankle opening is very wide. Got it on sale for $50 marked down from $220. Not worth keeping even at a deep discount.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Packaging--True to photo(s)
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically-awesome! Looked just like the photos & came in tasteful packing-Worth $50. Sadly, the 7.5 did not fit even after ordering an extra .5 size up following the previous reviews in reference to size. Definitely stiff as most new boots will inevitably be. Overall, sad they didn't fit me but I regifted to someone else who is a 7-Slightly big on her with thin ankle socks. So, I suppose it differs. If your foot is wider, or if you have one foot bigger than the other, I recommend ordering a complete size up. Hope that helps-Enjoy your Fenty(s)!
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Fenty x Chelsea Sneaker Boots Ill fit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Fenty brand. I have a few sneakers from them. I like the Chelsea boot but the fitting is ill fitting. I brought the 8 1/2 because the 9 runs to big for me. These boots fix a little tight in the front, but slides up and down around my heel. crazy I know. They're leather so see if they stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These are real Fenty Shoes. Very high quality and great packaging. Although they are for narrow feet. I put them on with struggle and felt discomfort but after 15 min walking around the house felt okay. Length wise they are fine. I'm still keeping them as I know they will stretch due to being real leather. It is very good buy just need to keep in mind to use shoe horn when putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Inna H.

customer_reviews.title: Order true to size and you’ll love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! I wear an 8 and ordered an 8 after reading a lot of reviews; I was worried that I should have sized up but decided to just order true to size and I’m so glad I did! Just a note that I have a normal foot- Not wide or narrow. They felt a little tight when I first put them on but after one wear they stretched some and feel so much better already. I wear them with boot socks and they still feel good. They look so good, are so comfortable and were such a great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin F.

customer_reviews.title: Need to stretch but get your true size!
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to sugar coat it. The boots run small. I didn't listen to any reviews about them running small because those reviews usually are not reflective of my foot size. When I got the boots I couldn't get my foot half way in YIKES! However, I could tell if I had gone up a size the boot would be entirely too loose. I invested in a pair of shoe wideners, crancked those babies up and eureka! Perfect fit. That worked so well I have them in ALL colors. I am always getting complements. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: tmartin

customer_reviews.title: Cool Shoe
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this at an awesome discount. The shoe was not a fake. They were really nice and the sole was very thick. Super durable and seems like it's for all weather types. Had to return it simply because it was bought for someone who is on their feet almost all day long and it didn't seem comfortable or supportive to an arch. Stylish shoe for young folks!
customer_reviews.author: Inga Bangiyeva

customer_reviews.title: I'm a very happy goth bad bitch
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek and stylish exterior. Once broken in these boots are so comfortable. The platform gives me some much needed height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: This is an OMG purchase. Just love these booths, I really wanted black, however the reviews helped me buy whatever color was available, I made the right choice. The fabric is real leather, very comfortable and true to size, I usually wear an 8M, I ordered it, it is so gorgeous if any other colors were available I would purchase them all. This will last me the rest of my life, I also like doc martens, I am stylish and young at 62, I love to dress differently from the crowd. I would definitely recommend these booths.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne Longchamp

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort together
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! I was looking for a Chelsea boot and this came up in my search. Added comfort of a sneaker with the Chelsea style! You can’t beat the price for a leather upper. The 2 inch platform is super comfy. I have a medium width foot with a low instep and narrow heel. Easy on/off due to elastic at back. This 7.5 was perfect for me. If you have a high instep or wide foot you may want to look at other styles. No sacrificing comfort for style! I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Look great but some technical issues
customer_reviews.text: These boots/shoes/sneakers are awesome, but for me they are too wide at the top to pull skinny jeans over them because there's a lot of space between them and my leg, but yet I can't tuck my jeans in them because of the nature of the stretch material at the back that causes the jeans to be pushed up creating a weird bulge of jeans around the top of the not. Since this was my whole reason for getting these, they won't work. So I'm giving them an average rating because for anyone like me there's going to be a limited amount of clothing that you can wear them with and have them look right.
customer_reviews.author: AllNatural

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. That's about it.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the style! The fit HURTS!!! One foot was wayyy tighter than the other and it's painful putting on and getting off. They're true to size though but they hurt really bad. I really wanted to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff, tight and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots but they are very stiff and uncomfortable :(. Even if you size up, I doubt its gonna solve the issue of tight area around the middle of the foot. So tight that I feel they’re gonna cut off my blood supply! Too bad I can’t return them since I wore them once. I gave them two stars because these boots are well constructed and look to be made out of good quality leather. If you have thin feet, these might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: The boots are too big ! I just contacted the seller. My plan is to order a half size down. I went a whole size up --based on the reviews. The width is crazy large, but the toe met perfectly where the stopped. I'm not sure if ordering a size down will suit my problems. Disappointed. I was super excited to receive these boots ! & I JUST received them.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes today and from the reviews, I was excited to receive them. When they got here, the left one already had creases in the leather like someone had tried it on. Upon further investigation, it looks like someone took a blue ink pen to these shoes! There is a line inside the left shoe, and behind both of the pull tabs. Also as far as sizing goes, I’m a 6.5 in US women’s, so I ordered a 7.5 and these shoes are still smashing my toes! Im not sure what to tell someone who is interested in this product, just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: True to size for me
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. I read all the reviews and ordered a half size up as there were so many "too tight/small" complaints but i wish i hadn't. I can see that if you have very large ankles or super wide feet needing to size up but i think they are true to size and very comfortable. Mine are too big because of reviews but I'm wearing them with very thick socks to keep them in place. They are comfy and look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Saw these fell in love and the fit is perfect! High quality! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.G

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow, but beautiful boot.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. It is a rather thick sole. But excellent quality. True to size, but super hard to get your foot into. I am a 7.5 always order 8 in closed toe. I received them and it took 10 minutes to get my foot into them. Big downside is they are very narrow. Even with a size up 8.5 the we’re squeezing my feet. They arrived quick. Beautiful packaging. I would Have kept the 8.5 even though they were a little big, but the width is just too small and there’s no way to stretch these due to the construction of the shoe. I was totally bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: GodsGift

customer_reviews.title: These Boots are the bomb
customer_reviews.text: I have received sooooo many compliments on these boots. I tell everyone I got them off amazon =) I would disagree with the other reviews as far as sizing, I normally where a 9 but bought a 10 based on comments in the reviews and they are a bit to large. I still rock them often, and they do not take long to break in
customer_reviews.author: Langston

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit at first, but they break in.
customer_reviews.text: These boots came in a lovely Fenty box, and are just really super cool. At first try-on, they felt tight. I wear a 7.5US and these were snug at first - especially sliding the foot in - but did break in. I’m glad I did not immediately return them. These are purely fashion boots, not for long walks (blisters), but great for going out for drinks or nothing too strenuous. I love the embroidered Fenty logo, and they look cool with most outfits! 🖤
customer_reviews.author: cdz

customer_reviews.title: trendy looking boot, perfect for my winter look- edgy with style!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and nieces (all teenagers) really liked these boots and said .."hey those are cool", so I guess I passed the cool test being over 40 and all. They fit normal, can't wear heavy socks with them, wear normal socks like with your tennis shoes. Great looking, came fast- love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Sperow

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these so bad! Surprised they fit anyone....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these so bad! They are so cute and I love the style, but they just didn't fit. I have wide feet, I know that, but that's one thing. What I could not get past is the indentation on the heel. There's a thick indentation on the heel that is super uncomfortable. Even with more narrow feet, I don't know how anyone could find these comfortable with that indentation sticking out so far into the shoe. Anyway, love the style and it is a good sturdy boot, but I think actual execution is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you do not have narrow feet or you will very much regret it.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look cute but are extremely uncomfortable! I wore them for 5 minutes at home to try them out, my feet were sore and painful. I have wide feet, so maybe this show is more suitable for people with narrow feet. They're beautiful shoes but it's impossible to wear them So far customer service has been accommodating and has started they will accept my return.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chelsea platform boot!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes. Super trendy for 2020! Just got mine today, and I love them. I wear a size 8, and I ordered an 8. I would say if you have wide feet, these shoes will not be a match for you. I have normal width, however, I can see why some said the toe box is narrow. This is a high quality shoe. The upper looks like leather and does not look cheap. I thought it was going to be more of a shiny leather, it is pretty matte. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾💕😆😍You will love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely looove these boots, I’m normally a 7 but went only half a size up like some of reviews recommend and I honestly don’t regret it. Also they are pretty heavy but I like heavy shoes so I don’t mind and they came very well secured in the shipment box, so no dents or anything. Will be buying the black pair too💕😩😆
customer_reviews.author: Kionna Fennell

customer_reviews.title: They run small on everyone a half size !
customer_reviews.text: They are a half a size to small but other then that the boot is freaking amazing and there is no way you will not love them in both colors . I got Vanilla and going to get black soon . I got a 6 and returning asap for the 6.5 . I cant wait to wear these babies. 😘
customer_reviews.author: Catherine / CAT ×:)

customer_reviews.title: Spoiler alert: This is Fenty not Fendi.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I am 2 years late on this style but wanted to gift myself.....again :-) Spoiler alert: This is Fenty not Fendi. Nice boots. Like the platform bottoms. Fits exact but am sure it can stretch with use. I will not try my orthotics so my feet will not be crammed so I hope my arches hold up when I wear these on the weekend. Ciao bella!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great boots, and I know, I have over 300 pairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything except for black stretch back, to obnoxious of a contrast that makes it look like retarded boot. All that aside as you can see on pics they are very cute and comfortable above ankles boots. It's leather, it's on rigid side, but not making it uncomfortable, true to size, and top is not loose, just loose enough to walk. I think for $30, they are amazing and cute platform boots. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but really had to break them in. I have narrow feet (5’s ladies) and bought the 5.5 ladies. The shoe is well-made and great for casual wear. But, the toe area was quite tight even with thin socks. When my feet swell up during the day from standing (I work in retail), I really felt the toe box. Overall, they are beautiful, but could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Salina Law

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: They are terribly hard to put on but true to size after they are on . The top ankle area is loose but the seams don’t let your foot slide in without a shoehorn . Visually they look a little bit like winter car tires on a person which I almost like . My favorite brand is vagabond which is chunky but sleek and very well made and I hoped these boots will be just a little edgier. Despite puma made soles , these boots are unconfortable and heavy and I’ve considered returning them but I wore them outside . One of the little straps broke when I pulled on it trying to get the boots on .
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Size up .5 but so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these. I ordered a half size up (normally 7, went to 7.5) after reading reviews and I’m glad I did. With that, the toe box fits well with enough space for thick socks, which I wore to initially start to break them in to avoid any potential heel blisters (happy to report: none!). The width is still a little snug, but not uncomfortable and can’t feel it when walking. Like others said, because of the heavy bottom my heel does come up slightly but it’s not annoying. I love them. If you’re on the fence, treat yourself to some good boots.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: They’re gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: My god they’re beautiful. Runs just a tiny bit small I think. I got an 8 (normally a size 7.5) so I could put an insole in there but it won’t fit. And not the greatest arch support but I knew going in I was going more for aesthetic than comfort. That said, they’re not horrible to wear or anything. And omg they’re gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: D Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: If I would have decided to wear these shoes I would have definitely gotten a blister within the first 5 minutes. I don't have time for me she used to cause me pain. I have a job where I work on my feet at least 6 hours a day so I can't afford an injury. In addition to the uncomfortable boot. I returned the boots on December 19th and for some reason they have not arrived at the warehouse. And I have not received credit for my shoe. I don't know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These boots are CUTE! I got the blue/lime, and they are much more blue than the photo, more light blue than slate, just FYI. But they are super bright and fun and while they are a little narrow on one part of my foot I think they will stretch just fine, and are generally comfortable. Can't wait to put them in outfits.
customer_reviews.author: lumbrgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: These are cool - my cousin has a pair and I’ve been going back and forth on getting them or not - then I seen they were on sale for like $35 bucks so I swung and got them. One down side is they are like my docs - hard to break in - and the rubbed the back of my heel so hard it blistered. Most leather shoes do this to me but once you break them in they are heaven - thick socks for now and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Danyale

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Weeks later, I LOVE these boots. They can be a bit narrow at the heel. There was some discomfort due to rubbing for a couple of days. It took some time to break them in but they’re great now. They provide great lift and style. I’ve worn them with jeans and ankle length pants.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: FENTY BOOTS 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE 💕 my FENTY boots!! I ordered the Black and the Vanilla Ice. They are comfortable but a bit heavy. Very good quality, the leather is nice and the soles are nice and thick. If you are the type that take care of your belongings these will last for years. And the shipping was amazing. I received my boots in 3 days. Another great buy from AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: So cute, wish they fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews and decided to size up to an 8.5. I normally wear a 7.5 or 8 but I do have wide feet. The toe portion of the shoe was very narrow and tight , but the heel was loose. Also because there's no lacing and the platform is so heavy it rubs your heel. Not a comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Dinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble...
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to the arrival of these sneaker boots. I loved the look/style of them. I read in the reviews that they ran small, so I ordered a half size bigger and the shoe still doesn't fit. It's almost impossible to get your HEEL down in the shoe. Once you do get it on it's very uncomfortable. Sucks because I really liked the look of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonnie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: A little snug but super cute and durable.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little snug but not so much that it will prevent me from wearing them. They are super cute. I think they’d work much better for a narrow foot. I have just normal medium width and they were snug. Outside of this they are comfortable and seem very durable. Thinking about getting them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Beloved43

customer_reviews.title: Not good fit on wide feet, otherwise beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 but the pair I ordered in that size was too narrow and tight so I returned and got an 8. So the 8's are too long for me but tight width ( but not strangling my feet like the 7.5). Not great for any wide feet. Beautiful shoes and great quality so I wish wider was an option. Comes with very nice box and velvet dustbag cover. They are the real thing, not fakes. Real leather. Going to wear with thick socks to prevent blisters. Side note: refund for my first pair took a long time and was short $6 so I had to contact them for the rest if my refund. Photo attached
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit. :(
customer_reviews.text: They look cool. Unfortunately they fit kind of tight but made my feet look wide. It also rubbed the back of my heels raw, they were so painful I couldn’t walk within 6 hour of having them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Pamani

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! I'm not a teen or even a young mom. I'm middle aged and I can walk in these boots and not feel like I'm about to fall over 😊 They look nice and make me feel like I have a bounce in my step. They do run about a half size too big so consider that when ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know....
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool shoe and I love the way they look BUT..... Man, no matter what socks I wear with them the boot drags my sock down into the shoe as I walk!!! SUCH A DRAG!! I have to keep pulling my socks up ALL THE TIME uuugh. I would wear them more but it’s a sock challenge each time.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Ridge in Back of Ankle
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these shoes, I wanted to keep them so badly but they started to rub the back of my ankle/heel area very hard, there's a weird ridge there. If you are sensitive to these kinds of things, stay away. Still giving 3 stars bc they were comfortable otherwise, true to size, so freaking stylish. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ammalynn

customer_reviews.title: Affordable chunky bootie
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I purchased a half size up, which I do not advise if you have a narrow/average feet. The booties are easy to put on and very comfortable. To make mine fit properly, I put two sets of inserts in the shoes which in turn elevated my height. I don’t understand the negative reviews. If you have wide feet than these could be problematic, if not, buy and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and designed
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! The packaging is over the top awesome! The leather is perfection. The embroidery is subtle but beautiful. The design is that of a shoe ten times this price. I love these boots!!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine withers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough to walk miles in.
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair , I have them in every color. I love the way they give me height ( I’m 5’2 for reference). They are very stylish and the material is excellent. They feel comfortable on my feet and do not leave me with arch pain, and yes they are authentic Fenty boots.
customer_reviews.author: Asya Morris

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow, not good for a normal to wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots soo bad as they are so fricken cute and totally my style but I have a wider foot and these were so narrow and tight it was painful to walk for more than 5 mins in them. I tried to brake them in for a month and no luck. I ended up selling them to someone I knew with a smaller narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are cool I have a narrow foot but I did go up a 1/2 of size they are Stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jax

customer_reviews.title: Something is not right about this shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I’ve got this on sale first one didn’t fit me at all my size so we returned and got size bigger now I still have hard time to put them on I’ve got my foot in there try to walk it moves on the back and it hurts. Something is not right about how this shoe is made. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Segura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are stunning. I’ll be wearing them every single day. I ordered them with the intention of returning them, because I was curious about the sneaker boot.....not expecting to love them. I love these. Even my husband and teenaged daughter approved, and that never happens.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLee719

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and different
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn it yet to write if it's comfortable or not...the fit is true to size I love the colors and wish they were made with all different color variations. As usual delivery was quick. Ps they do have the shape of rain boots and somewhat looks like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: wow! these are awesome! i got a size 7.5 as i usually wear 7-8. these are really comfortable and stylish. i like that they are not restrictive about the ankle! i am totally pleased with this purchase! they look and feel great!! i got an extra pair to exercise/dance in. incredible!
customer_reviews.author: alfred guy

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8 . I have very narrow feet as it is. But I'd recommend going up a half size. They are soooo tight. Super cute and Im sad to return them because all the other sizes are sold out but.. they are just too damn small.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly impressed Go Riri!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed from the moment I opened the package..not the shoe box. The package!! The presentation made me feel as if appreciation for the consumer was paramount from beginning to end. The quality of the box, pouch included and last and definitely not least..the boot itself. It is too early to speak about the wearing of since I just got them and only wore them once a day prior to writing this review. But I'm so confident and impressed..I bought a second pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Paige

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: So I just got them, they're freaking ADORABLE, packaging was phenomenal. But I'm usually a size 6, got a 6 1/2 and there's like half an inch of extra toe space.. but HELLA tight on the width of my feet.. I'm sure once they're broken in it'll be fine.. but legit narrow af and legit adorable. Was totally impressed with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Corina Thoos

customer_reviews.title: Puma Peds!
customer_reviews.text: On the 1st day I wore these shoes I received so many complements. It’s a cool and different boot. Not the average combat boot you see everyday. The shoes get a little heavy after walking all day. The fit is about average. I wear size 6 and feet didn’t hurt after 8 hours in it. The shoe kept eating my sock. I wore a thinner black dress sock the 1st time. I wore thicker socks from then on. Good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: thesa

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: I’m very picky with what goes on my feet. I wanna just say these boots are so Nice, you can dress them up are down . I get tons of compliments about my boots. I ordered an 8.5 because puma run small. Super comfortable can wear them all day. Go ahead and order a pair you won’t regret it, well at least I don’t .
customer_reviews.author: alesha clayton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great! Packaging is amazing. Overall I am happy with my purchase. They are boots and they need to be broken in. The fit will depend of how wide your foot is. They seem to be a touch narrow but again I think they just need to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Henry

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself!
customer_reviews.text: These were an unbelievable value. They're gorgeous. I love the lug sole-practically indestructible. They arrived in perfect condition-super fast delivery. I only wish I could get them in my size in another color!
customer_reviews.author: bgillard

customer_reviews.title: Mildew all over!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in vanilla, and there is black mold/mildew spots all over the boot. I can not get the spots off no matter what I do. I will be returning, I am appalled that they would send a defective item out.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy. Like bricks.
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to get them. When I did they didn’t resemble the photos. Very heavy, clunky looking, like Herman Muenster shoes. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Color is off but overall boot is good
customer_reviews.text: On the fence with these boots- they’re comfortable- easy on and off- the only thing that’s a point of contention is the color. Online the photo looks like they’re grey and neon but in reality they’re blue... not the same esthetic. May return based on that
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These boots are NOT made for walking!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning: the back of the boot is really hard and rubs up against your heel if you do a lot of walking. Yes, I ordered the correct size, .5 a size up and the boot would've been flopping off of my feet. Other than that they are super cute with comfortable soles. They need a softer back, whatever material is in the back of the boot is hard and unfitting for shoes like these.
customer_reviews.author: D.S

customer_reviews.title: ONE SHOE WAS BIGGER THAN THE OTHER 😡
customer_reviews.text: They sent me TWO different sizes. Both were size 7 but it looked like one shoe was a women’s 7 and the other was a men’s 7. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Sazze

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing and I get compliments on them every time I wear them. They are also unexpectedly great in the snow and rain. I totally did not expect to find these on Amazon for such a low price and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mayqueen

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and caused several blisters after wear. Wish they could be returned. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berri

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: If you’re size 7 you should get a size 8, because they DO run small. But the good thing is that they are as beautiful as in the picture. Only downside is the size
customer_reviews.author: King XO

customer_reviews.title: Cute, NOT COMFY!!
customer_reviews.text: Not comfy, but cute!!! If you wear thick socks or have a bunion or feet are a bit wide - you will be miserable!!! Cute to wear and stay seated. If you walk for more than 15 steps you will hate life!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Such good quality. It was weird though because the shoe bag it comes with is black and says dye may bleed.... the shoes I got are white so I’m too scared to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda and Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Blisters on Achilles
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but there is some sharp piece that sticks out where the material changes on the heel. The difference between the hard heel base and where the soft fabric of the body starts is a sharp plastic piece that cuts into your Achilles.
customer_reviews.author: StrackAttack

customer_reviews.title: Very 😡
customer_reviews.text: Very upset I have order two pairs of Fenty Puma from this seller. The first pair was not the size I ordered and had to pay shipping. Second pair I just received a few days ago was an size 8 and my woman size 7.5. The shoe fit like a size 4.5 or 5.5 couldn't fit my foot in the shoes. They paid for shipping this time but never again.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look, difficult fit at first!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are dope, there’s no doubt about that. And they look way more expensive than what you pay! I get compliments every time I wear them. However, as most of the reviews said, it’s almost impossible to get them on at first because of the toughness of the leather. So you have to be patient, try different socks, and be willing to break them in. I had blisters at first, but now I’m used to the feel. If comfort is your priority, I’d vote against these, but if style is, then I’d definitely recommend. I feel like the world is my runway when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: mikaela brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit after stretching!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots I bought a black pair but it took time to break them in and it was hard to get my foot in the boot at first but I stretched the leather over time now they fit perfectly so I assume the same will be with these!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable slightly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like them. True to color and look. Con: toe box is nice but it rubs a lot side of the foot next to pinky toe. Also hard to slide on in the heel area
customer_reviews.author: Jessieshopstoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Most compliments on a boot ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE these boots and everyone else does as well! The leather is beautiful and wears and cleans well. The sole is SUPER comfy. I would wear these every day if I could. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good leather.
customer_reviews.text: At first boots look big but I just can't refuse to wear it. Boots look gorgeous. I've been wear it almost every other days. :) Leather quality is very good and comfortable to wear it. Janet
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Love but fits badly
customer_reviews.text: These look fabulous. They are very narrow. I wear a 7.5, but I had to go to an 8.5 to get my feet in, but now they are too big in the toe and heel. Sucks cause they look so great, but sadly I’ll be selling or passing these along.
customer_reviews.author: Lish May

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Enough said.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful vanilla colored leather, come with a shoe bag and study box. They fit true to size and they are inexpensive ! What’s not to love ?
customer_reviews.author: MegW

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I order white shoes and they sent me shoes that are blue and neon green. Waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Eirené Grace

customer_reviews.title: So much shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They are chunkier than I could imagine wearing, and I love some chunk. Wasn’t looking for subtle, but these are just inflexible, comic and costume-ish.
customer_reviews.author: Shmoo

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and are just funky enough to wear with all kind of leggings, pants and casual dresses. They aren't snow boots, so I wouldn't wear them in a blizzard, but generally they wear well in the snow, and has a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: When i first tried them on they were tight. Next day i said let me walk around the house and break them in. All went well and i loveeee them. Many many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get into so stiff - bottom was not flexible at all. Like concrete. Hurt all over and just within a few steps (once on) I started getting blisters on heels and top of toes. So upset. Wanted to love and live in them.
customer_reviews.author: dlesquire

customer_reviews.title: Great quality super cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest!!!! I bought all the colors. They look like moon boots and I get so many compliments on them. Super quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They look just as good in person as the stock photo and I get a lot of compliments on them. I wear them all the time now. They are very comfortable. I have very high arches and my foot is narrow if that helps anyone. Fits perfectly (I'm an 8.5 US).
customer_reviews.author: Ayana Aughburns

customer_reviews.title: MUCH LOVE...Bout to order more colors!
customer_reviews.text: I need to order these in more colors, I love them and they're very comfortable! Looking online now...its a great looking boot for winter and will look great with skinny jeans or wide leges! TRY THEM LADIES!
customer_reviews.author: 4Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's narrow across the toes!!
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with These Boots the first time I saw them, it looks even better in person the only problem that I have with them, is that it's a bit too narrow across the toes, keep in mind I have very narrow feet, I I'm a size 8 but I usually buy my boots a half a size. I will recommend if you are interested in purchasing these boots to go a full size or a full size and a half depending on the width of your feet, overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my true size and went against the reviews suggesting to go up. The first week I wore them they were tight and irritated the back of my heel but now they fit great and a size up would be too big. I live in a cold climate and wear thick wool socks which helps to break in boots. I've been wearing them daily, I walk, bend and lift a lot at work and they have been fine since breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Blackcat

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I dislike I received the wrong color after waiting three weeks to get them and they also had powdered stains on them will not be reordering
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass Chelsea boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the thick sole and style of this boot. You have slide your foot in so size up because the heel and toe of this style is tight. But if you are looking to give Doc Marten's a break this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and made well but can't break them in!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for looks but zero stars for comfrt. I have been trying to break them in for months! Also i have wide feet and my lil pinky toes hurt in these after a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: Al Benkin

customer_reviews.title: The fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the boots look. Gives me a rugged, Doc Martin, Chelsea boot look. However, it rubbed the back of my heel causing blisters. Im trying to break them in, so I hope it becomes more comfortable with time.
customer_reviews.author: mello

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these
customer_reviews.text: Baby these shoes are such a blessing to my shoe collection! I get compliments on top of compliments. I’m going to order the vanilla color and see where they take me lol. I recommend them because of the versatility
customer_reviews.author: tiente

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: The look and quality of the shoe was very nice. Unfortunately, I was unable to get my foot in the shoe at all. I couldn't get my foot to slide over that really hard piece in the back of the shoe. I wear an 8.5 and sometimes buy a 9 in dress shoes for a slightly wider width but this is not a dress shoe. I returned the shoes easily and am debating upon return of my refund if trying a half size bigger would help.
customer_reviews.author: Kimm E.

product_meta.title: Puma Women's Fenty x Chelsea Sneaker Boots
product_meta.description: Here's another bold design courtesy of Rihanna's FENTY line for PUMA. With a sleek, monochrome silhouette and substantial platform, these confidence-boosting boots will have you feeling ready to take over the world.
